phaseBanner.content: This is a new service – your {{-openLink}}feedback{{-closeLink}} will help us to improve it.

footer.covidImpact: how theory tests are affected by coronavirus (COVID-19)
footer.enquiryInformation: Get the telephone number or email address if you want to {{-openLink}}contact DVA{{-closeLink}}.
footer.openingHours: Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm (except public holidays)

govUk.builtBy: Built by the {{-openLink}}Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency{{-closeLink}}
govUk.footerLicence: All content is available under the {{-openLink}}Open Government Licence v3.0{{-closeLink}}, except where otherwise stated

cookie.cookieP1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookie.cookieP2: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.

editMode.changeAlert: You can change your mind about this or you {{-openLink}}can keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.

loadingScreen.loadingCaption: Please wait a few moments while this booking is made.

bookingExists.heading: A confirmed booking for this test already exists
bookingExists.paragraph1: There is already a confirmed booking for the test you are trying to book.
bookingExists.paragraph2: You cannot book this test while an identical booking exists in the system.
bookingExists.paragraph3: You can {{-openLink}}check your theory test appointment details{{-closeLink}}.

notificationPreferenceSet.heading: You've set your cookie preferences.
notificationPreferenceSet.link: Go back to the page you were looking at

cookiePolicy.heading: Use of cookies on this service
cookiePolicy.para1: This service puts small files (known as 'cookies') onto your computer to collect information about how to use the service
cookiePolicy.para2: Cookies are used to remember the notifications you've seen so that we don't show them to you again. They are not used to identify you personally
cookiePolicy.para3: You will normally see a message before a cookie is stored on your computer.
cookiePolicy.para4: This service uses cookie types that allow the system to work securely and consistently. These are:
cookiePolicy.para5: This service sets a number of cookies to remember what you have done on the site and what messages you have seen.
cookiePolicy.para6: You may see a pop-up cookies message when you first visit the service. We'll store a cookie so that your computer knows you have seen it and knows not to show it again.
cookiePolicy.para7: We use Google Analytics software to collect information about how you use the service. This helps us make the service better for its users. Google Analytics stores information about:
cookiePolicy.para8: Google doesn't collect or store your personal information, for example your name or address, so this information can't be used to identify who you are. We don't allow Google to use or share our analytics data.
cookiePolicy.para11: We use SmartSurvey to collect feedback comments. If you use the feedback survey, SmartSurvey will save extra cookies to your computer to track your progress through it. See the SmartSurvey privacy policy for more information.
cookiePolicy.para13: Most services we link to are run by different government departments, for example HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) or the Home Office
cookiePolicy.para14: These services may set additional cookies and, if so, will have their own cookies policy.
cookiePolicy.list2-2: how long you spend on each page
cookiePolicy.list2-3: how you got to the site
cookiePolicy.list2-4: what you click on while you're visiting the site

table1.row1-2: Stores your acknowledgement of cookie use on this service
table1.row2-2: Stores a session identifier to keep track of your choices and data you have entered. This is required to complete a booking or make any changes during the booking process.

table2.row1-2: This helps us count how many people visit the service by tracking if you've visited before
table2.row2-2: Used to manage the rate at which the page view requests are made
table2.row3-2: Used to distinguish between users of the service

table3.row1-2: Used to relate sessions to a specific visitor’s device
table3.row2-2: Used to relate HTTP requests to a particular visit
table3.row3-2: Used to direct website traffic load to servers
table3.row4-2: Persists the token used to grant access to protected endpoints
table3.row5-2: Alleviate the problem of some browser dropping the post body when showing an interstitial page (to force the load of Imperva JavaScript) on a POST request. This is done by preserving the original post body as an encrypted payload in the cookie.

table4.row1-2: This cookie allows the volume of users to be managed when there is a high demand on the service.
table4.row2-2: This cookie allows the volume of users to be managed when there is a high demand on the service.

cookiePolicy.legendText: You can choose to turn off analytics cookies

imperva.heading: Imperva Incapsula cookies
imperva.para1: Imperva Incapsula cookies help the Imperva Incapsula service identify malicious activity.
imperva.para2: The cookies store information in an anonymous form. They don't collect or store any personal information (e.g. names or addresses) so this information can't easily be used to identify who the user is.

nonJs.heading1: Use of cookies on this service
nonJs.para1: Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
nonJs.para2: We use cookies to store information about how you use this service, such as the pages you visit.
nonJs.para4: We use Javascript to set most of our cookies. Unfortunately Javascript is not running on your browser, so you cannot change your settings. You can try:
nonJs.list1-2: turning on Javascript in your browser
nonJs.para6: Most services we link to are run by different government departments, for example HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) or the Home Office. We also use SmartSurvey to collect feedback comments.
nonJs.para7: These services may set additional cookies and, if so, will have their own cookies policy.
nonJs.para9: Most services we link to are run by different government departments, for example HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) or the Home Office
nonJs.para10: These services may set additional cookies and, if so, will have their own cookies policy.

accessibilityStatement.heading: Accessibility statement
accessibilityStatement.para1: This accessibility statement applies to to the {{-openFirstLink}}Driver & Vehicle Agency (DVA) Learner booking for Theory Test website{{-closeLink}} which can be accessed through the {{-openSecondLink}}nidirect.gov.uk{{-closeLink}} domain.
accessibilityStatement.para2: This website is run by the Department for Infrastructure. It is designed to be used by as many people as possible. The text should be clear and simple to understand. You should be able to:
accessibilityStatement.list1-1: change colours, contrast levels and fonts
accessibilityStatement.list1-2: zoom in up to 300% without the text spilling off the screen
accessibilityStatement.list1-3: navigate most of the website using just a keyboard
accessibilityStatement.list1-4: navigate most of the website using speech recognition software
accessibilityStatement.list1-5: use most of the website using a screenreader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)
accessibilityStatement.para3: The text we’ve used is designed to be clear and easy to understand.
accessibilityStatement.para4: {{-openLink}}AbilityNet{{-closeLink}} has advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.
accessibilityStatement.para5: Parts of this website are not fully accessible. For example:
accessibilityStatement.list2-1: the text will not adjust to become a single column when you change the size of the browser window
accessibilityStatement.list2-2: some online forms are difficult to navigate using just a keyboard
accessibilityStatement.list2-3: some of our error messages do not provide enough information to enable a user to correct the error
accessibilityStatement.list2-4: magnification is limited on the map on the ‘Choose a test centre’ page
accessibilityStatement.list2-5: our service has a timeout which might interfere with users completing tasks
accessibilityStatement.para6: We will update the statement when issues are fixed or when we expect them to be fixed.
accessibilityStatement.para7: {{-openLink}}Contact us{{-closeLink}} if you need information in a different format, for example accessible PDF, large print, easy read, audio recording or braille. Please provide:
accessibilityStatement.list3-1: the web address (URL) of the content
accessibilityStatement.para8: If you cannot view the map showing test centre locations {{-openLink}}contact us{{-closeLink}} for directions.
accessibilityStatement.heading4: Reporting accessibility problems with this website
accessibilityStatement.para9: We’re always looking to improve the accessibility of this website. If you experience a problem not listed on this page or think we’re not meeting accessibility requirements, you can {{-openLink}}contact us{{-closeLink}}.
accessibilityStatement.para10: The {{-openLink}}Equality Commission for Northern Ireland{{-closeLink}} is responsible for enforcing the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018 (the ‘accessibility regulations’).
accessibilityStatement.heading6: Contacting us by phone or visiting us in person
accessibilityStatement.heading7: Technical information about this website’s accessibility
accessibilityStatement.para12: The Driver & Vehicle Agency (DVA) Northern Ireland is committed to making its website accessible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.
accessibilityStatement.para13: This website is partially compliant with the {{-openLink}}Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1{{-closeLink}} AA standard, due to the non-compliances listed below.
accessibilityStatement.para14: Non-accessible content is listed here with the reasons for its inaccessibility.
accessibilityStatement.list4-1: Lists of features ‘About this test centre’ on the ‘Choose your test centre’ page lack correct elements.
accessibilityStatement.list4-2: Fails success criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships (Level A)
accessibilityStatement.list4-3: We plan to fix this by September 2021.
accessibilityStatement.list5-1: Links on the ‘booking confirmed’ page do not describe what will happen when activated. This is intended to make the links usable when printed.
accessibilityStatement.list5-2: Fails success Criterion 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) (Level A)
accessibilityStatement.list5-3: We plan to fix this by September 2021
accessibilityStatement.list6-1: The service uses a supplementary calendar date picker to populate a date field which does not function correctly for users of assistive technologies. There is an alternative text entry method for selecting a date.
accessibilityStatement.list6-2: This fails success criteria 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value (Level A), 2.1.1 Keyboard (Level A).
accessibilityStatement.list6-3: We plan to fix this by September 2021
accessibilityStatement.list7-1: Payment security provider logo image alt text is missing which may confuse screenreader users.
accessibilityStatement.list7-2: Fails success criterion 1.1.1 non-text content (level A)
accessibilityStatement.list8-1: Skip links are not always present, which may prevent screenreader and keyboard only users from skipping repetitive content.
accessibilityStatement.list8-2: Fails success criterion 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks (Level A)
accessibilityStatement.list9-1: No headings structure used which may prevent users who primarily use the headings structure to navigate efficiently.
accessibilityStatement.list9-2: Fails success criteria 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks (Level A) and 1.3.1 Info and Relationships (Level A)
accessibilityStatement.para15: We are working with our payment gateway provider to agree a date for the resolution of these issues.
accessibilityStatement.para16: We intend to make our services compliant with the {{-openLink}}Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1{{-closeLink}} AA standard. We are not claiming disproportionate burden for any part of our accessibility plan.
accessibilityStatement.heading21: Content that is not within the scope of the accessibility regulations
accessibilityStatement.para17: In order to book a theory test, you will need to provide information from your driving licence. The form that you add this information to has error messages that are deliberately vague if any information is entered incorrectly. Error messages on this screen must not tell hackers if some of the information is incorrect.
accessibilityStatement.heading22: What we are doing to improve accessibility
accessibilityStatement.para18: We have accessibility fixes captured in our service roadmap. They will be applied by September 2021.
accessibilityStatement.para19: This statement was prepared on 24 May 2021. It was last updated on 11 June 2021.
accessibilityStatement.para20: This website was last tested on 17 May 2021. The test was carried out by Digital Accessibility Centre (DAC). Every page was tested.

confirmSupport.heading: You did not tell us what type of support you need
confirmSupport.paragraph1: Your request might take longer to arrange if you do not tell us what support you need
confirmSupport.radio1: Tell us what support you need
confirmSupport.radio2: Book your theory test now without support
confirmSupport.radio3: Continue without telling us what support you need - this may take longer to arrange
confirmSupport.error: Select one option from the list

supportAlert.heading: Before you continue with your support request
supportAlert.para1: You will see the different support types available after you have entered more information.
supportAlert.para2-heading: Some types of support require evidence
supportAlert.para2: For some types of support we need to see evidence. This can be a letter, email, assessment or report that proves you currently have a health condition or disability, or find reading difficult.
supportAlert.para3-heading: When you don't need to provide evidence
supportAlert.para3: Evidence is not needed to get:
supportAlert.list1-2: on-screen British Sign Language (BSL) - with extra time, if selected
supportAlert.list1-3: a sign language interpreter or lipspeaker - with extra time, if selected

chooseSupport.heading: Get the right support during your theory test
chooseSupport.heading2: You may be able to select the support you need and book your test online now
chooseSupport.para1: We want you to have everything you need to take your test.
chooseSupport.para2: Many types of support are available if, for example, you:
chooseSupport.para3: You can {{-openLink}}learn more about the types of support available{{-closeLink}}. These include:
chooseSupport.para4: Or you can tell us you need support and we'll get in touch with you.
chooseSupport.para5: This may suit you better because we'll be able to:
chooseSupport.list2-4: extra time to complete your test
chooseSupport.list2-5: someone reading the questions for you
chooseSupport.list3-1: talk to you about how we can help
chooseSupport.list3-2: make any special arrangements you might need
chooseSupport.list3-3: talk about whether we need any evidence to support your request
chooseSupport.legend: Do you need support for your theory test?

editMode.changeAlert: You can change your mind about getting support or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.importantWarning: Important: If you do change your mind, you may need to update other information in this booking.

details.heading: Details of the person taking the theory test
details.headingSupport: Provide a few details to get the right support
details.p1: Enter the driving licence details of the person taking the test.
details.p2: These details are checked and used to show which test types are available.
details.p3: It's important the information is entered exactly as it looks on the driving licence.
details.firstNamesExampleLabel: - of where to find first and middle names on a driving licence
details.lastNameExampleLabel: - of where to find last name on a driving licence
details.licenceNumberExampleLabel: - of where to find driving licence number on a driving licence
details.errorMessage: You must enter these details as they appear on the driving licence. Please check them carefully and try again.

firstnamesField.label: First and middle names
firstnamesField.description: Enter the first and any middle names of the person taking the test. Do not include their title.
firstnamesField.hint: See section 2 of the driving licence.
firstnamesField.imageAltText: Image showing where to find first and middle names on a driving licence

surnameField.label: Last names
surnameField.description: Enter the surname of the person taking the test.
surnameField.hint: See section 1 of the driving licence.
surnameField.imageAltText: Image showing where to find last name on a driving licence

licenceNumberField.label: Driving licence number
licenceNumberField.description: Enter the 8-digit driving licence number of the person taking the test.
licenceNumberField.hint: See section 5 of the driving licence.
licenceNumberField.imageAltText: Image showing where to find driving licence number on a driving licence

dobField.label: Date of birth
dobField.description: Enter the date of birth of the person taking the test.

personalReference.label: Payment receipt number
personalReference.description: Enter payment receipt number from your instructor registration email

noTests.heading: You are not eligible for driving theory tests
noTests.description: Based on the information provided, you are not eligible for any tests. Contact DVA to find out more.

retry.heading: There was a problem
retry.description: A technical problem interrupted this service. You can {{-openLink}}try again to book this theory test{{-closeLink}} or wait and try later. If this problem persists, contact DVA.

loadingScreen.loadingCaption: Please wait a few moments while these details are checked.

emailContact.heading: Email of the person taking the theory test
emailContact.description: We need an email address to send a booking confirmation and a payment receipt.
emailContact.emailDescription: We’ll use this to send a confirmation email, a payment receipt and the test result.
emailContact.hint: The person taking the test must be able to access this email account.
emailContact.changeAlert: You can change the email address associated with this booking or {{-openLink}}keep the last one saved{{-closeLink}}.
emailContact.confirmEmailValidationError: Enter a valid confirmation email address
emailContact.emailTooLong: Email address must be 100 characters or fewer
emailContact.unmatchingError: Ensure confirmation email address matches email address

nonStandardAccommodation.heading: Provide an email address
nonStandardAccommodation.description: We'll only use this email address to confirm your support request.

testType.heading: Which theory test are you booking?
testType.support-heading: Which theory test type do you need support for?
testType.hintLine1: You are eligible to take tests for these vehicle types.
testType.hintLine2: Select the one you want to book now
testType.compensationHint: You recently had a theory test cancelled. Select this option to book a replacement test.
testType.compensationRefundLink: {{-openLink}}Request a refund{{-closeLink}} if you no longer need a theory test.
testType.changeAlert: You can change the test type or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.
testType.changeWarning: Important: if you change the test type and continue, you will need to enter the booking details again.
testType.cancelChangeButton: Cancel and keep existing test type
testType.subheading: Booking other types of theory tests
testType.entitlementText: You must have a category entitlement on your driving licence for any type of vehicle you want to drive.
testType.licenceCategoryLinkText: Learn more about driving licence categories
testType.validationError: You need to select a theory test

supportedLanguages.heading: Language support for the theory test
supportedLanguages.description: Theory tests are available in {{-openBold}}English{{-closeBold}}, {{-openBold}}Welsh{{-closeBold}} and {{-openBold}}sign language{{-closeBold}}.
supportedLanguages.descriptionERS: Theory tests are available in {{-openBold}}English{{-closeBold}} and {{-openBold}}sign language{{-closeBold}}.

receivedSupportRequest.heading: We have received a support request
receivedSupportRequest.paragraph1: There is already a theory test support request with these details in our response queue.
receivedSupportRequest.paragraph2: We are currently responding to a high number of enquiries but we will contact you as soon as possible.
receivedSupportRequest.paragraph3: You can continue to book a new test online now, or wait for us to contact you.
receivedSupportRequest.warningText: If you continue and make a new booking now:
receivedSupportRequest.warningOption1: your support options will be limited to voiceover or on-screen sign language
receivedSupportRequest.warningOption2: your existing support request will be {{-openBold}}cancelled{{-closeBold}}

testLanguage.heading: Which language do you want to appear on screen during the theory test?
testLanguage.changeAlert: You can change the test language or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.

translator.heading: Which language do you want translated?
translator.description: Tell us which language you want translated so you can take your driving theory test.

errorMessages.empty: Enter the language you need translated
errorMessages.tooLong: The translation language description must be 100 characters or fewer

editMode.changeAlert: You can change your mind about which language you want translated during your test. Or you can {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.

findTestCentre.heading: Find a theory test centre
findTestCentre.subheading: Find your most convenient test centre
findTestCentre.listItem1: see test centres on a map
findTestCentre.listItem2: get test centre addresses and other information
findTestCentre.searchLabel: Enter a postcode, town or city
findTestCentre.errorNotRecognised: No location results match your search. Please try again.

editMode.changeAlert: You can change the test location here or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.importantWarning: If you select a new location here, it will replace your previous choice. Date and time slots will still be subject to availability.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: Cancel and keep previously selected test location

selectTestCentre.heading: Select a theory test centre
selectTestCentre.changeLinkMore: the theory test centre search location
selectTestCentre.mapLink: View {{-centre}} test centre on Google Maps
selectTestCentre.mapSelectHint: Select a test centre on the map

error.heading: That search didn't work
error.paragraph1: A technical problem interrupted the location search.
error.paragraph2: You can {{-openLink}}try another search now{{-closeLink}} or wait and try again later. If this problem persists, contact DVA.

editMode.changeAlert: You can change the test location here or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.

selectDate.heading: Enter a date to check for available theory test time slots
selectDate.description: If no test slots are available on this date, this service can help you find one on another day.
selectDate.importantWarning: You can move or cancel your test up to 3 clear working days before the test date without losing your fee

loadingScreen.loadingCaption: Please wait a few moments while the availability is checked. This can take up to one minute.

manageBooking.heading: Enter a date for the theory test
manageBooking.li1: You can move or cancel a test up to 3 clear working days before the test date without losing your fee

errorMessages.dayEmpty: You need to enter a day
errorMessages.monthEmpty: You need to enter a month
errorMessages.yearEmpty: You need to enter a year
errorMessages.dateInPast: Date must be in the future
errorMessages.dateIsTodayOrTomorrow: There are no slots available today or tomorrow. Try another date.
errorMessages.dateBeyond6Months: Date must be within 6 months of today

editMode.changeAlert: You can change the test slot here or {{-openLink}}keep the date and time previously selected{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.importantWarning: If you select a new date and time here they will replace the details previously entered. Date and time slots are both subject to availability.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: Cancel and keep previously selected date and time

chooseAppointment.heading: Choose a time for the theory test
chooseAppointment.instruction: Check time slots at a different test centre

editMode.changeAlert:
You can change the test time here or {{-openLink}}keep the time previously selected{{-closeLink}}.
Date and time slots are both subject to availability.

chooseAppointment.warning1: There is no availability on this date. Try another day.
chooseAppointment.warningPast: Days in the past cannot be viewed
chooseAppointment.warningAfterEligibility: You are not eligible to take tests on the day selected. For eligibility queries, contact DVA.
chooseAppointment.warningBeforeEligibility: You are not eligible to take tests on the date selected. The earliest date you can book the test for is
chooseAppointment.warningSixMonths: This day is not yet available for booking. Check regularly as this may change.

errorMessages.invalidSlot: A technical problem interrupted this service. Please select the appointment slot again.

checkYourAnswers.heading: Check your details before paying

personalDetails.heading: Personal details
personalDetails.voicemailLabel: Consent to leave you phone messages

supportDetails.heading: Support Details
supportDetails.particularDay: I want a particular time or day
supportDetails.particularLocation: I know which locations I want
supportDetails.bslUnchangeable: To add sign language to this test you must first remove voiceover
supportDetails.voiceoverUnchangeable: To add voiceover to this test you must first remove sign language

checkYourAnswers.paymentWarning: Complete the payment process within 30 minutes. If you do not, this booking will be cancelled but you may still be charged. You will have to start your booking again and the test slot you were trying to book may no longer be available.

bookingCancelled.heading: Booking process cancelled
bookingCancelled.contentLine1: This booking process has been cancelled. No booking has been made and you have not been charged.
bookingCancelled.contentLine2: You can start your booking again but the test slot you were trying to book may no longer be available.

general.contentLine1: A technical problem interrupted this service.
general.contentLine2: You can {{-openLink}}try again to submit your support request{{-closeLink}}
general.contentLine4: If this problem persists, contact DVA

paymentInitiation.contentLine1: A technical problem means payments cannot be made at the moment. You can {{-openLink}}try again to pay{{-closeLink}} or wait and try later. If this problem persists, contact DVA.

paymentConfirmation.contentLine1: A technical problem means your payment cannot be confirmed. This booking has been cancelled.
paymentConfirmation.contentLine2: If the payment is found to have been successful, it will be refunded as soon as possible.
paymentConfirmation.contentLine3: We're very sorry. Please {{-openLink}}try again to book your theory test{{-closeLink}}.
paymentConfirmation.contentLine4: If this problem persists, contact DVA.

paymentUnsuccessful.contentLine1: A technical problem means your payment was not successful. This booking has been cancelled.
paymentUnsuccessful.contentLine2: We're very sorry. Please {{-openLink}}try again to book your theory test{{-closeLink}}.

paymentSystemError.heading: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
paymentSystemError.contentLine2: We have not saved your booking. You will have to {{-openLink}}start again{{-closeLink}}.
paymentSystemError.contentLine3: If your payment went through, DVA will refund you within 7 business days
paymentSystemError.contentLine4: {{-openLink}}Contact DVA{{-closeLink}} if you continue to have issues with your booking. Use the reference {{bookingReference}}

slotConfirmation.contentLine1: We're very sorry. A technical problem disrupted this booking. The order has been cancelled. Its reference is {{bookingReference}}.
slotConfirmation.contentLine2: If your payment went through, DVA will refund it within 7 business days.
slotConfirmation.contentLine3: You can {{-openLink}}try booking again now{{-closeLink}} or wait and try later. If this problem persists, contact DVA.

bslVoiceoverOption.contentLine1: The combination of sign language and voiceover is not available. Select either one of these options and try again.

bookingConfirmation.heading: Theory test booking confirmed
bookingConfirmation.bookingRefPrompt: You'll need it to check, change or cancel this test. Consider taking a screenshot, or
bookingConfirmation.importantStatement: Make sure you arrive 15 minutes before your test time. This is to sign in, prove your identity and get ready for the test.
bookingConfirmation.importantCovidPolicy: You must comply with the test centre COVID-19 safety measures and wearing of face coverings which can be checked here -
bookingConfirmation.provingIdentitySubheadingStatement: You must bring these items to your test:
bookingConfirmation.provingIdentityFirstBullet: both parts of your valid signed Northern Ireland driving licence (photocard and paper counterpart) or
bookingConfirmation.provingIdentityCandidateSecondBullet: your valid signed GB photocard licence showing your provisional entitlement, and a printed summary (dated within a week of your test date) of your driving licence record from {{-openLink}}www.gov.uk/view-driving-licence{{-closeLink}}
bookingConfirmation.provingIdentityInstructorSecondBullet: your valid signed GB photocard licence and a printed summary (dated within a week of your test date) of your driving licence record from {{-openLink}}www.gov.uk/view-driving-licence{{-closeLink}}
bookingConfirmation.provingIdentityCandidateAdditionalStatem: If your GB photocard licence does not show your provisional entitlement you must obtain written confirmation form the DVLA of your provisional entitelement.
bookingConfirmation.provingIdentityOldStyle: If you have an old style non-photographic licence, you must bring acceptable photographic evidence of your identity as well as your licence. You can learn more about which types of photographic ID are acceptable on the government's wesbite, {{-openLink}}www.nidirect.gov.uk/motoring{{-closeLink}}
bookingConfirmation.cancelWarning: Your test may be cancelled and you could lose your fee if you are late or do not bring the right documents with you
bookingConfirmation.personMust: The person taking the test must:
bookingConfirmation.arrive: arrive 15 minutes before the test start time
bookingConfirmation.bringLicence: bring their driving licence (Old-style, paper licence-holders should also bring a valid passport, or other photo-ID)
bookingConfirmation.security: All test centres are security monitored.
bookingConfirmation.itemsCheck: As you enter the test room, you'll be checked for items that could be used to cheat. Your test may not go ahead if you do not allow this check.
bookingConfirmation.cheatWarning: It is illegal to cheat in a theory test. You can be sent to prison and banned from driving.
bookingConfirmation.itemsPrompt: When you arrive at the test centre, all devices should be switched off and personal items must be placed in the secure locker provided. Items include but are not limited to:

items.phones: mobile phones and other electronic devices

bookingConfirmation.largeItems: Large items cannot be stored in our test centres.
bookingConfirmation.securityChecks: As part of our security checks, you may be asked to remove or adjust outer clothing, personal belongings or accessories.
bookingConfirmation.foundItems: If you cannot store all your items or are found to have any of these items in the test room:
bookingConfirmation.voided: your test may be stopped and voided
bookingConfirmation.leave: you may be asked to leave
bookingConfirmation.refunded: the test fee may not be refunded
bookingConfirmation.noWaiting: Test Centres have no waiting facilities for any adults or children accompanying candidates.
bookingConfirmation.learnMore: You can learn more about preparing for a car theory test including free practice tests
bookingConfirmation.afterTheTestParagraph: We'll send the test result summary to the email address you booked with.
bookingConfirmation.cancelSubheading: Checking, changing or cancelling this test
bookingConfirmation.cancellationThreeDays: You can change or cancel this test up to 3 clear working days before the test date without losing your fee.
bookingConfirmation.cancellationPolicy: If this booking is changed or cancelled after
bookingConfirmation.checkDetails: Check the details of this test
bookingConfirmation.checkChangeCancel: Check, change or cancel this test

nonStandardAccommodation.evidenceNeededHeading: Send us evidence now to complete your support request
nonStandardAccommodation.evidenceNotNeededHeading: Your theory test support request has been sent
nonStandardAccommodation.panelContact: Your request will not be processed until this evidence is received
nonStandardAccommodation.printPagePrompt: You may find it useful to
nonStandardAccommodation.importantBanner: We are currently responding to a high number of enquiries and we will contact you as soon as possible to arrange your theory test.
nonStandardAccommodation.emailAlsoSent: We've also sent you an email confirming your support request.

whatToDoNow.emailEvidenceParagraph2: You can send as many documents as you need to provide evidence.

importantInfo.paragraph: To help speed up your support request, include your:

otherWaysToSendEvidence.heading: Other ways to send evidence
otherWaysToSendEvidence.paragraph: Alternatively, you can post your evidence to:

additionalTextForDeafUsers.title: When you don't need to provide evidence
additionalTextForDeafUsers.paragraph: You don't need to provide evidence if you are deaf or have a hearing impairment and asked for support related to deafness, as well as extra time. If you asked for any other type of support you will need to provide evidence.

evidenceRequirements.heading: Your evidence
evidenceRequirements.title: Make sure your evidence:
evidenceRequirements.point2: contains your first and last name
evidenceRequirements.point3: is a letter, email, diagnostic assessment or report
evidenceRequirements.point4: is from an educational or medical professional, an occupational therapist or an official organisation
evidenceRequirements.point5: signed and on headed paper, if it's a letter or report
evidenceRequirements.linkIntro: You can learn more about evidence on the government's website here:

evidenceRecieved.paragraph: We will check your evidence to make sure it enables you to get the right support. We will contact you when we have done this.

youMayNeedEvidence.title: You may need to provide evidence
youMayNeedEvidence.paragraph: For some kinds of support you may be asked to provide evidence. This is usually a letter, email, diagnostic assessment or report from an educational or medical professional, an occupational therapist or an official organisation.

evidenceAlreadyProvided.title: Evidence
evidenceAlreadyProvided.paragraph1: Some kinds of support require evidence. This is usually a letter, email, diagnostic assessment or report from an educational or medical professional, an occupational therapist or an official organisation.
evidenceAlreadyProvided.subHeading: If you have provided evidence before
evidenceAlreadyProvided.paragraph2: If you provided evidence for a theory test you failed, we don't need to see it again unless the support you need has changed.

changeLocationTime.heading: What do you want to change?
changeLocationTime.changeAlert: You can change your previous response here or {{-openLink}}go back and keep it{{-closeLink}}.
changeLocationTime.description: Select one option. Your existing booking will be held until you make and confirm any changes.
changeLocationTime.validationError: Please select what you want to change

loadingScreen.loadingCaption: Please wait a few moments while the availability is checked. This can take up to one minute.

changeTimeOnlyOption.label: Just the time of the theory test
changeTimeOnlyOption.hint: New time slots on your existing test day may not be available.

changeTimeAndDateOption.label: Time and date of the theory test
changeTimeAndDateOption.hint: Your existing time slot may be unavailable on a different day.

changeLocationOption.label: Location of the theory test
changeLocationOption.hint: Your existing date and time slot may be unavailable at a different location.

manageBookingLogin.heading: Enter the booking reference and driving licence number of the person taking the theory test

bookingReferenceField.label: Booking reference
bookingReferenceField.descriptionLine1: The booking reference number was sent to the email address used to book the theory test.
bookingReferenceField.descriptionLine2: If you do not have a booking reference {{-openLink}}contact DVA{{-closeLink}}

licenceNumberField.heading: Driving licence number
licenceNumberField.label: Enter your driving licence number
licenceNumberField.description: It's important that the driving licence number is entered exactly as it looks on the driving licence of the person taking the test.
licenceNumberField.hint: See section 5 of the driving licence

errorMessages.fieldsLeftBlank: Enter both the booking reference and candidate's driving licence number to access this booking
errorMessages.incorrectDetails: You must use the most recent driving licence number and the correct booking reference. Please check the details you have entered, then try again.

retry.description: A technical problem interrupted this service. You can {{-openLink}}try again to manage your theory tests{{-closeLink}} or wait and try later. If this problem persists, contact DVA.

loadingScreen.loadingCaption: Please wait a few moments while the booking is retrieved.

manageBookingHome.heading: Your theory test bookings
manageBookingHome.noBookings: You have no theory tests booked.

bookingsWithErrors.header: A technical problem means these test bookings cannot be found:
bookingsWithErrors.contentLine1: Please contact DVA to recover or reschedule this test.

manageBookingHome.bookingCompensationAlert: One or more of your booked theory tests have been cancelled. You can {{-openLink}}book a replacement test{{-closeLink}} using the fee already paid or request a fee refund.

manageBookingChange.heading: Change, reschedule or cancel this theory test
manageBookingChange.sameDayRefundWarning: Booking cannot be cancelled or refunded on the day they are booked.
manageBookingChange.refundWarningText: You cannot get a refund or reschedule this test after {{date}}.
manageBookingChange.rescheduleWarningText: You cannot reschedule this test after {{date}}.
manageBookingChange.cannotMakeChange: You cannot make changes to this theory test. Please contact DVA.
manageBookingChange.testTodayWarningText: This test is today. Changes are no longer possible.
manageBookingChange.changeIneligibleWarningText: You cannot make changes to this theory test. Please contact DVA.
manageBookingChange.technicalProblemWarningText: A technical problem means this booking cannot currently be cancelled or changed. Please try again later.

testSupportNeeded.heading: Additional support during the test
testSupportNeeded.extraTimeWithBreak: Extra time – pause HPT and /or breaks

manageBookingCancel.heading: Cancel this theory test
manageBookingCancel.description: Select one option. When you select
manageBookingCancel.description-2: your existing booking will be permanently removed.
manageBookingCancel.contact: Contact the Driver and Vehicle Agency (DVA) to get help cancelling your theory test appointment.
manageBookingCancel.differentServicePrompt: There is a different service to {{-openLink}}cancel your theory test in England, Scotland and Wales{{-closeLink}}.

loadingScreen.loadingCaption: Please wait a few moments while the booking is cancelled.

manageBookingCancelConfirmation.heading: Theory test cancelled
manageBookingCancelConfirmation.cancelDescription: This driving theory test has been cancelled.

error.heading: Booking not cancelled
error.contentLine1: A technical problem prevented this booking from being cancelled.
error.contentLine2: You can {{-openLink}}try again to cancel this booking{{-closeLink}}. If this problem persists, contact DVA.

general.contentLine1: A technical problem prevented this test from being changed.
general.contentLine2: You can {{-openLink}}try again to change this booking{{-closeLink}}. If this problem persists, contact DVA.

slotUnavailable.contentLine1: The new test slot you attempted to book is no longer available. {{-openLink}}Select another slot and try again{{-closeLink}}.
slotUnavailable.contentLine2: Contact DVA if you have any questions. The existing booking remains unchanged.

noRetry.contentLine1: A technical problem means your booking cannot be found.
noRetry.contentLine2: Please contact DVA to recover or reschedule this test.

loadingScreen.loadingCaption: Please wait a few moments while the booking is updated.

loadingScreenRescheduling.loadingCaption: Please wait a few moments while the booking is rescheduled.

manageBookingRequestRefund.heading: Request refund for a cancelled test
manageBookingRequestRefund.body-1: Select one option. Select '{{-openBold}}Confirm refund request{{-closeBold}}' to send your request. Or you can use the fee from your cancelled test to pay for a replacement test.
manageBookingRequestRefund.body-2: Refunds are sent to the account used for the original payment
manageBookingRequestRefund.payReplacementTestButton: Use my fee to pay for a replacement test

manageBookingRefundConfirmation.heading: Refund request sent
manageBookingRefundConfirmation.body-1: Refunds are sent to the account used for the original payment.
manageBookingRefundConfirmation.body-2: We have sent you an email confirming details of this refund request.

voiceover.heading: Which voiceover language do you want?

editMode.heading: Do you want a voiceover used during the test?
editMode.validationError: You must select a voiceover language. Alternatively, select 'I do not want a voiceover'.
editMode.contentLine1: Instructions and the test questions will be read aloud through headphones provided in the test room.
editMode.changeAlert: You can change your mind here about hearing a voiceover used during the test, or
editMode.changeAlertLink: go back and keep your previous choice
editMode.yesOptionPrefix: Yes, I want a voiceover in
editMode.noOption: No, I do not want a voiceover
editMode.cancelChangeButton: Cancel and keep your existing choice

supportMode.paragraph1: You can select from these available voiceover languages.
supportMode.paragraph2: If the language you want is not available, you can {{-openLink}}return to the previous screen{{-closeLink}} and request a translator.

manageBookingChangeBSL.heading: Do you want On-screen British Sign Language used during the test?
manageBookingChangeBSL.formHint: Instructions and the test questions will be signed on screen
manageBookingChangeBSL.errorBannerNotification: You need to select an option.
manageBookingChangeBSL.bslFormOption: Yes, I want On-screen British Sign Language
manageBookingChangeBSL.noneFormOption: No, I do not want On-screen British Sign Language

editMode.heading: Do you want On-screen British Sign Language?
editMode.changeAlert: You can change your mind about including On-screen British Sign Language in this theory test or {{-openLink}}go back and keep your previous choice{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: Cancel and keep your existing choice

leavingNsa.heading: You do not need to provide evidence for the support type you selected
leavingNsa.paragraph1: You can select 'Continue' to book your theory test online now.
leavingNsa.paragraph2: Or, if you prefer, select 'Ask us to contact you about support' and we'll contact you to:
leavingNsa.bullet1: match your needs to the right support
leavingNsa.supportButton: Ask us to contact you about support

returningCandidate.heading: We'll contact you to arrange your test with support
returningCandidate.paragraph1: We'll contact you as soon as possible to:
returningCandidate.paragraph1-bullet2: arrange your test with the right kind of support
returningCandidate.evidenceParagraph: Some kinds of support require evidence. This is usually a letter, email, diagnostic assessment or report from an educational or medical professional, an occupational therapist or an official organisation.
returningCandidate.providedEvidenceBeforeParagraph: If you previously provided evidence to DVA and it was accepted, we don't need to see it again unless the support you need has changed.

customSupport.heading: Tell us what support you need
customSupport.paragraph1: You can provide more information about what you need here.
customSupport.paragraph2: Some types of support need time to arrange. This means you may not be able to book online now.
customSupport.errorMessage: The text you enter here must be 4000 characters or fewer

editMode.changeAlert: You can tell us more about the support you need here. Or you {{-openLink}}can use the information you have already provided{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: Cancel and use information already provided

selectSupportType.heading: What test support do you need?
selectSupportType.para1: Select all the support types you need. If the support type you need is not in this list, select 'I need something else'.
selectSupportType.bslInterpreter: An interpreter next to me using a sign language
selectSupportType.readingSupport: Help with reading the test questions or entering your answers

errors.noneSelected: You must select at least one option. If the support you want is not listed, select 'I need something else'.
errors.badCombination: You have selected sign language and voiceover. Please select only one of these options. If the support you want is not listed, select 'I need something else'.
errors.invalidOptionSelected: The support type selected is not available for this theory test. You can try again and select other types of support.

editMode.changeAlert: You can tell us more about the support you need here. Or you can {{-openLink}}use the information you have already provided{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.importantWarning: If you change your choices here, all details previously entered will be replaced.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: Cancel and use information already provided

voicemail.heading: Can we leave telephone messages if we can't reach you?

selectStandardSupportType.heading: Which support would you like?
selectStandardSupportType.para1: Select the type of support you would like in your theory test. If neither option would be useful, select 'I do not want support'.

errors.noneSelected: You must select at least one option. If the support you want is not listed, select 'The support type I want is not here'.

editMode.changeAlert: You can tell us more about the support you need here. Or you can {{-openLink}}use the information you have already provided{{-closeLink}}.
editMode.importantWarning: If you change your choices here, all details previously entered will be replaced.
editMode.cancelChangeButton: Cancel and use information already provided

preferredDay.heading: Is there a day and time that's best for you?
preferredDay.paragraph1: Tell us if there's a particular time of day, or day of the week that's better for you. We will try to arrange your test around these choices.
preferredDay.paragraph2: If you are flexible about when you take your test, select 'I will decide this later'.
preferredDay.option1: I want a particular time or day
preferredDay.errorMessage: The text you enter here must be 4000 characters or fewer

preferredLocation.heading: Which test locations are most convenient?
preferredLocation.paragraph1: Our test centre network gives you the flexibility to take your theory test near where you live, work or study.
preferredLocation.paragraph2: If you're not sure of the best place yet, select 'I will decide this later'.
preferredLocation.option1: I know which locations I want

option1Content.paragraph1: Tell us if there are particular locations that would be better for taking your test. For example, 'Leeds and Bradford' or 'south London'.

preferredLocation.option1Hint: Enter the test locations you want
preferredLocation.errorMessage: The text you enter here must be 4000 characters or fewer

telephoneContact.heading: Would you prefer to be contacted by telephone?
telephoneContact.telephoneTooLongError: The telephone number must be 50 characters or fewer

editMode.changeAlert: You can change your mind about this or {{-openLink}}keep your existing choice{{-closeLink}}.

alreadyReceivedSupportRequest.heading: We have already received a Support Request
alreadyReceivedSupportRequest.paragraph1: There is already a theory test support request with these details in our response queue.
alreadyReceivedSupportRequest.paragraph2: We are currently responding to a high number of enquiries but we will contact you as soon as possible.
alreadyReceivedSupportRequest.paragraph3: You can make changes to your support request when a member of our team contacts you.

500.heading: Service temporarily unavailable
500.description: A technical problem with our system means this service isn't available right now.
500.apology: We're very sorry. Please try again later.

404.heading: This page cannot be found
404.paragraph1: Sorry, the page you're looking for cannot be found.
404.paragraph2: Check the web address is correct and try again.
404.gbServiceLinkText: You can {{-openLink}}book your theory test in England, Scotland or Wales{{-closeLink}}.
404.niServiceLinkText: There's a different service to {{-openLink}}book your theory test in Northern Ireland{{-closeLink}}.

slotUnavailable.title: Error: Booking not successful
slotUnavailable.heading: Booking not successful
slotUnavailable.description: Unfortunately the test slot you have attempted to book is no longer available.
slotUnavailable.button: Select another slot and try again

timeout.title: Error: Booking timed out
timeout.heading: Booking timed out
timeout.description: Sorry your booking has timed out due to inactivity.

technical.title: Error: booking failure
technical.heading: There is a problem
technical.description: A technical problem interrupted this service.
technical.startAgain: Please {{-openLink}}start your booking again{{-closeLink}}, or try again later.

timeout.line1: Your booking will time out soon.
timeout.line2: We will reset your booking if you do not respond in 5 minutes. We do this to keep your information secure.

nonjs.line1: Your booking will time out after 30 minutes of inactivity.
nonjs.line2: We will reset your booking if you do not continue from this screen within 30 minutes. We do this to keep your information secure.

privacyPolicy.heading: Book and manage your theory test: privacy notice

aboutThisService.heading: About This Service
aboutThisService.paragraph1: This privacy notice applies to theory tests booked to take place after 3 September 2021.
aboutThisService.paragraph2: The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) provides the service to book and manage your driving test. DVSA is an executive agency of the Department for Transport (DfT).
aboutThisService.paragraph3: We carry out theory tests in Great Britain. This service lets you choose the date, time and theory test centre you want to take your theory test at. It also lets you change your appointment or cancel it.
aboutThisService.paragraph4: The data controller for DVSA is DfT - a data controller determines the reasons and how personal data is processed. For more information see the Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO) {{-openLink}}Data Protection Public Register{{-closeLink}}. DfT’s registration number is Z7122992.
aboutThisService.paragraph5: We may use GOV.UK Notify to send you emails or text messages about your theory test. This is a service provided by the Government Digital Service, which is part of the Cabinet Office. We are the data controller for your data within that service. The Cabinet Office is the data processor.

dataWeNeed.heading: What data we need
dataWeNeed.paragraph1: The personal data we collect from you will include:
dataWeNeed.list1-2: address, telephone number and email address
dataWeNeed.list1-5: disability, health conditions and learning difficulties, if you say you have any and need reasonable adjustments for your theory test
dataWeNeed.list1-6: driving licence number and entitlement details (provided by DVLA), disqualification dates (if you’ve been disqualified) and previous driving licence numbers (if you have any)
dataWeNeed.list1-7: type of test you’re taking - if you’re taking an instructor theory test, we will also collect your personal reference number
dataWeNeed.list1-8: the language you’ve asked to use when you take your test (English and Welsh)
dataWeNeed.list1-9: your Safe Road User Award (if you have one) unique learner reference number, pass date and date your record was last updated
dataWeNeed.list1-10: information about past health and safety incidents that stop you from booking online
dataWeNeed.list1-11: payment details - including card holder’s name, card holder’s billing address, card number (numbers are encrypted and access is restricted), dates the card is valid from and to, issue number and card type (for example, MasterCard)
dataWeNeed.paragraph2: The legal basis for processing this data is:
dataWeNeed.list2-1: Road Traffic Act 1988 (as amended) specifically Part III and V (vocational licences), sections 125, 132, 159a and 162A
dataWeNeed.list2-2: The Motor Vehicles (Driving Licences) Regulations 1999 (SI 1999/2864) (as amended), specifically Part III
dataWeNeed.list2-3: The Motor Cars (Driving Instruction) Regulations 2005 (SI 2005/1902) (as amended), specifically part II and V
dataWeNeed.list2-4: The Vehicle Drivers (Certificates of Professional Competence) Regulations 2007 (as amended) (SI 2007/605) (made under powers in European Communities Act 1972, Part III of the Road Traffic Act 1988; and Finance Act 1973) specifically regulations 5 and 8.

whyWeNeed.heading: Why we need it
whyWeNeed.paragraph1: We need the personal data we collect from you to:
whyWeNeed.list1-1: check you’re entitled to take a theory test
whyWeNeed.list1-3: take the payment for your theory test and give you a refund if you cancel your test giving 3 clear working days’ notice (Sundays and public holidays do not count as working days)
whyWeNeed.list1-4: send you a confirmation of your appointment
whyWeNeed.list1-5: contact you if we need to change your test appointment or let you know about disruption to our services
whyWeNeed.list1-6: contact you if the way the theory test works is changing, and you need the information to properly prepare for your test
whyWeNeed.list1-7: carry out your theory test - including making any reasonable adjustments for any disability, health condition or learning difficulty
whyWeNeed.list1-9: record your test result so we know if you’re eligible to take your driving test
whyWeNeed.list1-11: ask you to take part in research projects to help us understand how easy our services are to use and how we improve road safety

whatWeDo.heading: What we do with it
whatWeDo.paragraph1: We collect, use and store the data you give us for the reasons set out in this policy.
whatWeDo.paragraph2: Pearson VUE and Reed In Partnership act as our data processor to administer and carry out theory tests. They are allowed to collect and process personal data on our behalf.
whatWeDo.paragraph3: Our contracts with Pearson VUE and Reed In Partnership say that they must make sure any of their subcontractors meet the same data protection requirements and standards
whatWeDo.list1-1: sell or rent your data to third parties
whatWeDo.list1-2: share your data with third parties for marketing purposes
whatWeDo.paragraph5: We will share your data if we are required to do so by law - for example, by court order, or to prevent fraud or other crime.

howLongWeKeep.heading: How long we keep your data
howLongWeKeep.paragraph1: We will only keep your personal data for as long as it is needed for the reasons set out in this policy or for as long as is required by law.
howLongWeKeep.paragraph2: We will hold your personal data for:
howLongWeKeep.list1-1: 30 months to administer your theory test booking, including checking you’re eligible to take the test
howLongWeKeep.list1-3: 42 months for data about your Safe Road User Award, if you have one
howLongWeKeep.paragraph3: We will hold personal data about you and your behaviour that’s a threat to our staff or other candidates for whichever of these is the shortest:
howLongWeKeep.list2-1: until you’ve passed your theory test
howLongWeKeep.list2-2: until you’ve failed your theory test, but didn’t display any further abusive behaviour
howLongWeKeep.list2-3: 2 years since your last test, unless you’ve been charged with a criminal offence - in this case, your data is kept until you pass your theory test
howLongWeKeep.list2-4: where a quarterly review shows the threat you pose has reduced

whereItMightGo.heading: Where it might go
whereItMightGo.paragraph1: Our IT infrastructure and technology has been checked to make sure it is safe and secure.
whereItMightGo.paragraph2: Pearson VUE and Reed In Partnership are allowed to collect and process personal information within the UK.

protectingYourData.paragraph1: The {{-openLink}}DVSA personal information charter{{-closeLink}} sets out what steps are taken to protect your data, and the rights you have over your data.
protectingYourData.heading: Protecting your data and your rights

changesToNotice.heading: Changes to this notice
changesToNotice.paragraph1: We may change this privacy notice at our discretion at any time.
changesToNotice.paragraph2: When we change this notice, the date on the page will be updated. Any changes to this privacy notice will be applied to you and your data as of that revision date.
changesToNotice.paragraph3: We encourage you to periodically review this privacy notice to be informed about your data is protected.

contactUs.heading: How to contact us
contactUs.paragraph1: If you have any questions about anything in this document or if you consider that your personal data has been misused or mishandled you can contact the DVSA data protection manager.
contactUs.paragraph3: You may also make a complaint to the Information Commissioner, who is an independent regulator.
contactUs.contactDvsa: {{-openLink}}Contact DVSA customer services{{-closeLink}} if you have a query that is not about how your personal data is used.

notRequired.heading: We'll contact you to arrange your test with support
notRequired.description: We'll contact you as soon as possible to:
notRequired.line2: arrange your test with the right kind of support

required.heading: Send us evidence and we'll contact you to arrange your test with support
required.description: You must send us evidence before your test can be booked. We’ll show you how to do it shortly.
required.subheader: Avoid delaying your test by sending your evidence now
required.subdescription: Send your evidence as soon as possible to avoid delay in booking your test.
required.line2: contains your first and last name
required.line3: is a letter, email, diagnostic assessment or report
required.line4: is from an educational or medical professional, an occupational therapist or an official organisation
required.line5: signed and on headed paper, if it’s a letter or report

mayBeRequired.heading: We'll contact you to arrange your test with support
mayBeRequired.description: We'll contact you as soon as possible to:
mayBeRequired.line2: arrange your test with the right kind of support

subsection.header: You may need to provide evidence
subsection.listDescription: To get some kinds of support you may have to provide evidence. When we know more about what support you need:
subsection.line1: we will tell you if you must provide evidence
subsection.line2: what kinds of evidence can be used
subsection.footer: Evidence is usually a letter, email, diagnostic assessment or report from an educational or medical professional, an occupational therapist or an official organisation.

deafCandidate.header: When you don't need to provide evidence
deafCandidate.description: You don't need to provide evidence if you are deaf or have a hearing impairment and asked for support related to deafness, as well as extra time. If you asked for any other type of support you will need to provide evidence.

content.paragraph1: Please wait while your payment and booking are confirmed.
content.paragraph2: This can take up to one minute.
content.paragraph3: Do not refresh this page or use the browser back button.
content.paragraph4: It could affect your payment or booking.
